overview:
The first 15 minutes of the film are absolute force! I heard speak a so pornöse Synchro such bad dialogues rarely. The relationship between Yako and its friend works so ridiculously in scene set that it resembles indeed a relevation for B-Movie-fans. Then it goes off into the forest.
title: Yako, cazador de malditos
